front.title: RTP Payload Format for MPEG-4 Audio/Visual Streams

abstract.t: This document describes Real-Time Transport Protocol (RTP) payload formats for carrying each of MPEG-4 Audio and MPEG-4 Visual bitstreams without using MPEG-4 Systems. For the purpose of directly mapping MPEG-4 Audio/Visual bitstreams onto RTP packets, it provides specifications for the use of RTP header fields and also specifies fragmentation rules. It also provides specifications for Media Type registration and the use of Session Description Protocol (SDP). Comments are solicited and should be addressed to the working group's mailing list at avt@ietf.org and/or the author(s).
